医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
凯斯西储获得 150 万美元的 NIH 拨款以改善细菌性阴道病治疗细菌性阴道病 (BV) 是影响 15 至 44 岁女性生殖系统的最常见疾病，与早产、妇科恶性肿瘤和性传播疾病等严重健康风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Case-Western-Reserve-secures-2415-million-NIH-grant-to-improve-bacterial-vaginosis-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Case-Western-Reserve-secures-2415-million-NIH-grant-to-improve-bacterial-vaginosis-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c63493fe-0432-4615-8ed2-d09f63b1528d Mon, 25 Nov 2024 11:08:23 -0500 Case Western Reserve secures $1.5 million NIH grant to improve bacterial vaginosis treatments
遵循美国农业部指南，婴儿更好的生长与健康的产前饮食有关研究结果表明，优质的产前饮食对于婴儿的健康成长至关重要，可能会降低儿童肥胖的风险并促进发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Better-infant-growth-linked-to-healthy-prenatal-diet-following-USDA-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Better-infant-growth-linked-to-healthy-prenatal-diet-following-USDA-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d6ecbbd-d2ad-49cb-8516-d7a3b3dfb206 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 11:08:00 -0500 Better infant growth linked to healthy prenatal diet following USDA guidelines
研究揭示细胞年轻的秘密可能在于核仁的大小威尔康奈尔医学研究人员表示，细胞年轻的秘密可能取决于保持核仁（细胞核内的一种浓缩结构）较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-reveals-the-secret-to-cellular-youth-may-lie-in-nucleolus-size.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-reveals-the-secret-to-cellular-youth-may-lie-in-nucleolus-size.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea83a8fd-2507-40eb-ba2f-e2570839d71f Mon, 25 Nov 2024 09:30:06 -0500 Study reveals the secret to cellular youth may lie in nucleolus size
新研究为阿尔茨海默病的可靠诊断提供了见解慕尼黑大学医院的一个研究小组研究了未来如何更可靠地诊断阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/New-study-offers-insights-into-reliable-Alzheimers-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/New-study-offers-insights-into-reliable-Alzheimers-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6ce9853-ccf7-4626-a480-0e7fa4dc2507 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 08:39:00 -0500 New study offers insights into reliable Alzheimer's diagnosis
CrestOptics 和 Tomocube 合作通过新的多模态成像平台推进 3D 成像高端显微镜解决方案和先进荧光显微镜系统制造商 CrestOptics SpA 与全息摄影 (HT) 技术领导者 Tomocube 今天宣布开展战略合作，提供下一代多模态成像平台 HT-X1™加https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/CrestOptics-and-Tomocube-partner-to-advance-3D-imaging-with-new-multimodal-imaging-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/CrestOptics-and-Tomocube-partner-to-advance-3D-imaging-with-new-multimodal-imaging-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c198366-d9c5-4d02-b665-3d16c38262c0 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 08:29:00 -0500 CrestOptics and Tomocube partner to advance 3D imaging with new multimodal imaging platform
Steritas 宣布与 argenx 合作，为新型类固醇节约疗法提供证据Steritas LLC. 是一家致力于加强类固醇治疗患者护理的公司，今天宣布与全球免疫学公司 argenx 达成许可协议，在 argenx 的开发项目中使用其 STOX® 类固醇毒性临床结果评估 (COA) 套件用于差异化免疫学治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Steritas-announces-collaboration-with-argenx-to-advance-evidence-for-novel-steroid-sparing-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Steritas-announces-collaboration-with-argenx-to-advance-evidence-for-novel-steroid-sparing-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f7ede74-a6ec-4a65-8a45-d413f1cea006 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 08:27:00 -0500 Steritas announces collaboration with argenx to advance evidence for novel steroid-sparing therapeutics
突破性研究揭示线粒体 DNA 耗竭综合征线粒体 DNA 耗竭综合征 (MTDPS) 是一种罕见的遗传性疾病，其特征是线粒体 DNA (mtDNA) 显着减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Groundwriting-research-sheds-light-on-mitochondrial-DNA-depletion-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Groundwriting-research-sheds-light-on-mitochondrial-DNA-depletion-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78ba19e1-f6b2-429a-95ad-53243665b323 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 08:24:58 -0500 Groundbreaking research sheds light on mitochondrial DNA depletion syndrome
Asimov 和 RevOpsis Therapeutics 签署高滴度多特异性表达细胞系许可协议推进治疗药物设计和制造的合成生物学公司 Asimov 今天宣布与 RevOpsis Therapeutics （“RevOpsis”）签订 CHO Edge 系统的许可协议，RevOpsis Therapeutics 是一家下一代生物制药公司，在眼科治疗中率先创新多特异性生物制剂https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Asimov-and-RevOpsis-Therapeutics-sign-licensing-agreement-for-high-titer-multispecific-expressing-cell-line.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Asimov-and-RevOpsis-Therapeutics-sign-licensing-agreement-for-high-titer-multispecific-expressing-cell-line.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f05b01b0-f29f-4a04-8dd3-7dd3dd83add4 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 08:24:00 -0500 Asimov and RevOpsis Therapeutics sign licensing agreement for high titer multispecific-expressing cell line
Enterprise Therapeutics 发表了 ETD001 的药物化学，这是一种用于治疗囊性纤维化的新型吸入 ENaC 阻滞剂Enterprise Therapeutics Ltd（Enterprise）是一家致力于发现和开发新疗法以改善呼吸系统疾病患者生活的生物制药公司，今天宣布在《欧洲药物化学杂志》上发表一项同行评审研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Enterprise-Therapeutics-publishes-on-medicinal-chemistry-of-ETD001-a-novel-inhaled-ENaC-blocker-for-treatment-of-cystic-纤维化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Enterprise-Therapeutics-publishes-on-medicinal-chemistry-of-ETD001-a-novel-inhaled-ENaC-blocker-for-treatment-of-cystic-纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ddf4950-ba2b-45e8-9b20-1553858ada12 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 08:20:00 -0500 Enterprise Therapeutics publishes on medicinal chemistry of ETD001, a novel inhaled ENaC blocker for treatment of cystic fibrosis
Mursla Bio 的 EvoLiver 超越了肝癌监测的现行标准，在 2024 年 AASLD 肝脏会议上公布的数据Mursla Bio 是细胞外囊泡 (EV) 科学领域的领导者，其使命是通过动态活检技术的力量显着改善高危患者的癌症结果，今天宣布了其多中心临床研究 MEV01 的结果，该研究与领先的学术机构包括伦敦大学学院、伦敦帝国学院、圣玛丽亚大学医院和格拉茨医科大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Mursla-Bios-EvoLiver-surpasses-current-standards-in-liver-cancer-surveillance-data-presented-at-AASLD-Liver-Meeting-2024。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Mursla-Bios-EvoLiver-surpasses-current-standards-in-liver-cancer-surveillance-data-presented-at-AASLD-Liver-Meeting-2024。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2df0c55-60d0-4cfe-8838-c74c01b33dfd Mon, 25 Nov 2024 08:19:00 -0500 Mursla Bio's EvoLiver surpasses current standards in liver cancer surveillance, data presented at AASLD Liver Meeting 2024
